mbean.name: NrPublisher
mbean.description: Publishes operational log messages to Notification Receiver

attribute.name: FailCount
attribute.description: # of failed attempts to publish messages to Notification Receiver

attribute.name: MaxMessages
attribute.description: Maximum # of operational messages to keep in queue - will be truncated after this limit

attribute.name: MessageThreshold
attribute.description: # of operational messages that trigger a publishing attempt

attribute.name: ProcessingInterval
attribute.description: Time in ms between publishing attempts if message threshold is not exceeded

attribute.name: Activated
attribute.description: Is the publisher activated by configuration

operation.name: flushMessages
operation.description: Tries to publish the operational log messages currently in the queue
